Reva brings Sandy to help with the tree and his Christmas spirit after talking to him about his announcement. Marah gives him a piece of her mind upset her cousin is sad. Marina tries to talk him into caroling but he doesn't want to go after she leaves he calls for someone to take him to the gym for a workout. Alan take Gus to the chapel to see Lucia. Lucia wants Alan to sing but he won't. As Alan and Gus go to leave Gus kisses his mother goodbye.
